sections.title: Overview
sections.content: This document defines a REST/GraphQL backend API service including goals, scope, stakeholders, constraints, and success metrics.

sections.title: Architecture
sections.content: Service is stateless; uses Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL. Includes API gateway, auth (OIDC), and observability (OTel).

sections.title: Data Model
sections.content: Primary entities: User, Account, Session, Resource. Normalize to 3NF; include migration plan.

sections.title: Interfaces
sections.content: REST endpoints with OpenAPI spec; GraphQL schema for complex querying; rate limits and pagination.
